Name: Victorian Lemonade
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Gin laced, mint flavoured, traditional lemonade.
